medium: Pen and brown ink and brown wash over black chalk on faded blue-green paper
title: Two Studies of the Bound Christ (recto); Study of the Bound Christ (verso)
description: recto:  two figure sketches; figure at right faces left, turned 3/4, with head down and wrists bound; figure at left faces right, bent forward at the waist, wrists bound; cloudy wash overall; cloudy third figure at top center--bleeding through from back of sheet; verso not examined--received framed
